LanguageData.BAW_Hibiki.label: Fancy Light
LanguageData.BAW_Hibiki.description: Hibiki's fondly used mortar.\n\nOccasionally finding use in her daily experiments, it is used to fire various other things alongside shells.
LanguageData.BAW_Hibiki.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Hibiki.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Hibiki.label: Shell of Fancy Light
LanguageData.BAW_Neru.label: Twin Dragon
LanguageData.BAW_Neru.description: Neru's dual submachine guns.\n\nA beautiful golden dragon pattern is engraved upon both guns.
LanguageData.BAW_Neru.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Neru.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Neru.label: Bullet of Twin Dragon
LanguageData.BAW_Akane.label: Silent Solution
LanguageData.BAW_Akane.description: A pistol that Akane always carries.\n\nNamed such in contrast to the explosives she usually tends to use.
LanguageData.BAW_Akane.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Akane.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Akane.label: Bullet of Silent Solution
LanguageData.BAW_Asuna.label: Surprise Party
LanguageData.BAW_Asuna.description: The assault rifle used by Asuna.\n\nIt seems she has forgotten the meaning behind its fun and lively sounding name.
LanguageData.BAW_Asuna.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Asuna.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Asuna.label: Bullet of Surprise Party
LanguageData.BAW_Toki.label: Secret Time
LanguageData.BAW_Toki.description: Assault rifle used by Toki./n/nIt has the performance to match its appearance, and eliminates all targets that interfere with her mission. Toki didn't choose the name, somebody else named it.
LanguageData.BAW_Toki.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Toki.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Toki.label: Bullet of Secret Time
LanguageData.BAW_Karin.label: Hawkeye
LanguageData.BAW_Karin.description: An anti-materiel rifle used exclusively by Karin.\n\nEven from far away in the sky, her shots land with unmatched accuracy.
LanguageData.BAW_Karin.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Karin.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Karin.label: Bullet of Hawkeye
LanguageData.BAW_Midori.label: Fresh Inspiration
LanguageData.BAW_Midori.description: Midori's sniper rifle.\n\nAttached to the rifle is an accessory given to Midori by her beloved older sister, and she always finds inspiration when needed by playing around with it.
LanguageData.BAW_Midori.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Midori.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Midori.label: Bullet for Fresh Inspiration
LanguageData.BAW_Momoi.label: Unique Idea
LanguageData.BAW_Momoi.description: The assault rifle used by Momoi.\n\nAttached to the rifle is an accessory given to Momoi by her beloved younger sister, and she always comes up with new ideas when needed by playing around with it.
LanguageData.BAW_Momoi.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Momoi.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Momoi.label: Bullet of Unique Idea
LanguageData.BAW_Yuzu.label: Nyan's Dash
LanguageData.BAW_Yuzu.description: The gun carried by Yuzu.\n\nIt has a cute image of an forever-flying cat on the side.
LanguageData.BAW_Yuzu.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Yuzu.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Yuzu.label: Nyan's Dash
LanguageData.BAW_Aris.label: Sword of Light: Supernova
LanguageData.BAW_Aris.description: The massive railgun that Arisu received from the engineering club.\n\nIts size and power output are so great that ordinary students would struggle to simply walk around with it.
LanguageData.BAW_Aris.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Aris.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Aris.label: Hikari
LanguageData.BAW_Noa.label: Secretary's vote
LanguageData.BAW_Noa.description: Pistol with a conversion kit used by Noa.\n\nWith the stock extended, it can be fired like a submachine gun.
LanguageData.BAW_Noa.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Noa.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Noa.label: Bullet of Secretary's vote
LanguageData.BAW_Yuuka.label: Logic n Reason
LanguageData.BAW_Yuuka.description: A submachine guns used by Yuuka.\n\nIt helps Yuuka make rational and intelligent decisions even under pressure at critical times.
LanguageData.BAW_Yuuka.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Yuuka.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Yuuka.label: Bullet of Logic n Reason
LanguageData.BAW_Rio.label: Final Finesse
LanguageData.BAW_Rio.description:
The revolver used by Rio.

To achieve her goals, all necessary means must be taken.

And for Rio, who has always been alone, violence is an essential finesse for her.
LanguageData.BAW_Rio.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Rio.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Rio.label: Bullet of Final Finesse
